Bosse_Unknown Source_Status_Bursting Gro: Covered in rupturing cells, which will explode when this effect expires.
Bosse_Unknown Source_Status_Directed Gro: Covered in hemorrhagic cells, which will spray in the indicated direction when this effect expires.
Bosse_Unknown Source_Status_Fate Of The: Bound to the earth and unable to jump.
Bosse_Unknown Source_Status_Flesh Back_D: Infected by cells that will burst propulsively when this effect expires, resulting in knockback.
Bosse_Unknown Source_Status_Flesh Forwar: Infected by cells that will burst propulsively when this effect expires, resulting in knockback.
Bosse_Unknown Source_Status_Shared Grote: Covered in fusing cells, which will create a concentrated explosion when this effect expires.
ContentDesc_Arkadion - Superschwergewich: Upon claiming the Tyrant's crown, you are escorted to the uppermost floor of the Arcadion, where you are at last granted an audience with the president. Yet what meets your eyes is the horrific sight of his soul-imbued form─the serpentine Lindwurm. Arrayed behind him is a sickening display of the fallen immortalized, sacrifices in the president's bid to create a fighter who could contend against him. Now, the stage is set─to avenge the victims of his sinister script and rise to become the true grand champion, you must stop the president once and for all!
Instancecontenttextdata_40711_Text: Oh dear! The challenger has fallen out of the ring!
Instancecontenttextdata_40727_Text: Even I felt that! Can't afford to be careless, now!
Instancecontenttextdata_40728_Text: A direct hit! But they're still standing!
Instancecontenttextdata_40732_Text: Once again they slip beyond their opponent's reach!
Instancecontenttextdata_40733_Text: Oh no, they've been felled with a vengeance!
Instancecontenttextdata_40734_Text: And they're down! Can they recover from this?
Instancecontenttextdata_40736_Text: And they're back in action! Can they turn the tide!?
Instancecontenttextdata_43901_Text: His arm has a life of its own! Is this the power of the mythical Lindwurm?
Instancecontenttextdata_43902_Text: His arm is slithering out! That's disgusting!
Instancecontenttextdata_43904_Text: Watch out! That is one cruel coil...
Instancecontenttextdata_43906_Text: His arms are snaking 'round the ring! What's he planning!?
Instancecontenttextdata_43908_Text: Oh no, the gore has latched onto the champion! Don't panic!
Instancecontenttextdata_43909_Text: The Lindwurm's completely healed! What outrageous regenerative power!
Instancecontenttextdata_43910_Text: What the─? Could the Lindwurm's regeneration be out of control!?
Instancecontenttextdata_43912_Text: Is there no limit to his regenerative capacity!?
Instancecontenttextdata_43914_Text: They've been struck with venom! But they can weather it─they must!
Instancecontenttextdata_43916_Text: The battle is decided! Victory goes to the champion!
